|brand = Linksys |model = WAP54G |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v2 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 07/21/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Linksys_WAP54G_v2.0 |wlclass = G54 |series = WAP54G |type = access point |sernum = MDG2 |fcc_id = Q87-WAP54GV2 |icid = 3839A-WAP54GV2 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4712;BCM4712KPB, HA0410 P11, 715951 P; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = BMIPS3300 |cpu1spd = 200 <!-- 200 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = Parallel |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F160C3BD70;AMD AM29LV320DB-90EI; |flash1size = 2 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 8 |ram1chip = ICSI;IC42S16400-6T;Dynachip D98SD64 16AH-60310A; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:0F:66,00:12:17 |oui = 00:0F:66,00:12:17
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;2.4.20;;
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 0.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.245 |defaultlogin = <!-- Leave blank --> |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WAPB-108GL |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT, OpenWrt,
|availability = common |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/04/2003 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Broadcom;BCM2050; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-TNC |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = 7 |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== WAP54G v2 serial numbers appear to start with '''MDG2'''.
Same hardware as the [[SparkLAN WX-6800-II]], [[TRENDnet TEW-410APBplus]] :(FCC ID: MXF-A930209G)
Additional FCC IDs of Q87-HGA7T-2 (Linksys HGA7T, high gain antennas) and Q87-HGA5T-2 (Linksys HGA5T, high gain antennas) ID/OD measurements may not be exact
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wap54g ''WAP54G series'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Linksys_WAP54G On the '''DD-WRT''' wiki] *[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I2pnciMghvI '''Linksys WAP54G Case Opening and Antenna Repair Demo''' on YouTube]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRTNotice|vintmicroreq}} {{DDWRTNotice|k24req}} *[[TechInfoDepot:DD-WRT/Linksys WAP54G|Flashing Linksys WAP54G All Versions]] {{DDWRTNotice|wapflash}}
===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|notrecommended}} {{OpenWrtNotice|insufficient}} {{OpenWrtNotice|endsupport|2022|19.07.10}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = |wikipage = http://wiki.openwrt.org/oldwiki/openwrtdocs/hardware/linksys/wap54g |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
